name: Sylvie’s Cornmeal-crusted Salmon Burgers
description: A west coast favourite with a delightful cornmeal crunch.

ingredients.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix or Guacamole Dip Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or dip mix of your choice

preparation: Drain cans of salmon, reserving approximately 2 tbsp liquid. Flake salmon into a large bowl. Add reserved liquid and remaining ingredients, except cornmeal and oil.
Gently mix, then form into patties. Coat patties with cornmeal.
Heat frying pan to medium. Add oil and pan-fry patties for approximately 4 min per side, until crisp and brown on the outside and warmed through.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with Epicure Creamy Coleslaw and a seasonal side salad with prepared Epicure Dressing.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, onion & garlic.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!

products.name: Burger Seasoning
summary: Tired of bland burgers? Level up with one simple seasoning that’s packed with the robust flavours of onion, garlic, and red bell pepper, and a mild paprika kick. Just combine the seasoning with ground beef, chicken, pork, or turkey for mouth-watering burgers every single time.

products.name: Buffalo Seasoning (1011492)
summary: Feel the heat with this low-sodium, spicy blend that goes way beyond wings!
